contents.Header: Overview of Each UI Element ≈ Left to Right

contents.Text: This will enable Discord Rich Presence and show the rest on the options.
This contains options to customise the look of RPC.
This includes if RPC will hide the "current playing song" and if it will show "Discord RPC" when "Paused/Idle".
This allows the user to add delimiters to the Discord Rich Presence.
Delimiters are used to cut out the song identifier from the end of the song name.
Right clicking on one of the delimiters will remove it.
